body_html:
@ZisIsNotZis I was able to run the first code snippet in GPU and received consistent results across all batches. Didn't observe different result in last batch as you mentioned.

Also, I noticed that the first code runs very slowly and consumes a lot of memory, i.e. close to 8G, which may be the reason for abnormal behavior. You may need to do some optimization there.

body:
@ZisIsNotZis I was able to run the first code snippet in GPU and received consistent results across all batches. Didn't observe different result in last batch as you mentioned.

Also, I noticed that the first code runs very slowly and consumes a lot of memory, i.e. close to 8G, which may be the reason for abnormal behavior. You may need to do some optimization there.
